item.description: 2 Spots currently available.  Your choice of wood either Alaskan Yellow Cedar or Western Red Cedar.  We held a similiar workshop in November and it was very popular!  While woodworking skills make this a bit easier, they aren't required.  This is a full day and we recommend that you plan on staying for dinner and bring a potluck item!  Short tool list provided after you sign up.
item.how_to_find_us: From Main Street in Brownfield, turn up Dugway Rd, we are one mile on right. First Right after "Hidden Drive" #247 on sign.
item.why: Come and make your own Greenland paddle! Your paddle blank will be made to your specific body measurements ready for you to carve on the day of the workshop.
item.name: Traditional Greenland Paddle Building Workshop
